description.oldValue:
IT Admins can configure and require a meeting ID
and passcode to join a meeting on Teams Rooms on Windows to ensure higher
levels of security and privacy. This feature is available for Teams Rooms Pro
customers.
description.newValue:
,IT Admins can configure and require a meeting ID
and passcode to join a meeting on Teams Rooms on Windows to ensure higher
levels of security and privacy. This feature is available for Teams Rooms Pro
customers.
